snippet: Mr. Ieng Sary was part of an inner circle of communists who led the movement that caused the deaths of 1.7 million people in Cambodia from 1975 to 1979.
abstract: Ieng Sary, former foreign minister of Cambodian Khmer Rouge who was one of three elderly leaders on trial on charges of genocide, crimes against humanity and war crimes, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ieng Sary was part of an inner circle of communists who led the movement that caused the deaths of 1.7 million people in Cambodia from 1975 to 1979.

headline.seo: Ieng Sary, Khmer Rouge Leader Tied to Genocide, Dies at 87
headline.main: Ieng Sary, Former Official of Khmer Rouge, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Ieng Sary, Former Official Of Khmer Rouge, Dies at 87

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
